# init(_:content:)

**Initializer**

Creates a menu button with the specified localized title and content.

## Declaration

```swift
nonisolated init(_ titleKey: LocalizedStringKey, @ViewBuilder content: () -> Content)
```

## Creating a menu button

- **init(label:content:)**: Creates a menu button with the specified label and content.

items.description: Creates a menu button with the specified label and content.
items.name: init(label:content:)

title: init(_:content:)
